reviewText: I honestly couldn't take it at one point.  My family had bought me one of esteban's guitars (which also aren't that great since they're all the same with different paint jobs on them 2/5 also) with this DVD set.  Basically he tells you the order of notes for you to play, and then "plays it with you", when he really spices up the whole thing to make you look dumb.  There's no technique teaching and Esteban just gets annoying after a while.  The DVDs are now collecting dust on my counter
